name: Guide Me to Exit
description:
A 5~10  minutes one map game, made for RPG Biz One Map Game Challenge.

A boy  lost  in the "Woods",  a place which lurk many "Beast"s, animals that's become ferocious and dangerous. You need to "Guide" him through the "Woods", avoiding those "Beast"s, pushing somekind of fireballs,  find the exit of a labyrinth, and sacrifices some chickens.
